title: The latest AI news we announced in January
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/LatestAI_v5.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Google AI announcements from January

title: The new era of browsing: Putting Gemini to work in Chrome
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/chrome_rollercoaster.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Learn more about new agentic capabilities coming to Chrome, powered by Gemini 3.

title: 60 of our biggest AI announcements in 2025
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2025AI_Hero.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Look back on Google AI news in 2025 across Gemini, Search, Pixel and more products.

title: Take the web for a fresh spin with GenTabs, built with Gemini 3
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Disco_SizzleGentabs_Thumbnail_1.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">GenTabs is part of a new Google Labs experiment that proactively creates custom web applications to help you navigate the web

title: 4 new ways Chrome autofill will simplify your holidays
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Chrome_Autofill_Blog_Header_1.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Chrome can now remember your loyalty card and flight details for faster submission.

title: Our favorite Chrome extensions in 2025
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Best-of-2025_Header_With_Date_-.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Here are some of our favorite Chrome extensions from this year to help you supercharge your browser with AI.

title: AI Mode in Chrome is easier to use on iOS and Android.
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_videos/wagtailvideo-93k5q8em_thumb.jpg">Plus, the AI Mode shortcut is expanding to 160 more countries

title: Chrome now helps you fill in passport, driver’s license, vehicle information and more.
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_videos/wagtailvideo-90f_qv3k_thumb.jpg">Chrome already saves you time every day by securely filling in your addresses, passwords and payment information. Today, we’re making it even more helpful. For desktop u…

title: The latest AI news we announced in September
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Sep_AI_Recap_2025_hero.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Here are Google’s latest AI updates from September 2025

title: Chrome: The browser you love, reimagined with AI
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Blog_image_1920x1080_1.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Google is taking the next step in its journey to make your browser smarter with new AI integrations.

title: Go behind the browser with Chrome’s new AI features
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Main_video_thumbnail.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Google Chrome is getting upgraded with the latest AI to make it safer, smarter and more useful

title: 5 Chrome features I use all the time as a college student
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Chromebacktoschool_Hero.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">These Chrome features and tips for students can help you learn more easily while staying organized and focused, too.

title: Chrome is helping you shop smarter and safer with store reviews.
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Web_Trust_Advisor_Keyword_Blog_.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">We’re introducing store reviews to Google Chrome in the U.S. to make your online shopping experience safer and more efficient. This feature uses data from Google Shoppin…

title: New Chromebooks and tools for even better teaching and learning
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/ISTE2025_ChromeOS_KWblog-header.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">The classroom’s getting an upgrade this school year with new software like Class tools and hardware like Chromebooks, Chromebook Plus and Chromebox OPS.

title: You can now move your Chrome address bar to the bottom of your Android screen.
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Chrome_Android_Bar_Blog_Header_.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">It's now possible to customize Chrome on Android by moving your address bar to the bottom of the screen.Depending on the size of your hand and your device, one address b…

title: Introducing Google AI Ultra: The best of Google AI in one subscription
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Google_AI_Ultra_Blog_Header_Ima.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Learn about Google AI Ultra, Google’s new AI subscription with the highest access to our most capable models and premium features.

title: New AI and accessibility updates across Android, Chrome and more
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Blog_header_2096x1182_Option_2.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">In honor of Global Accessibility Awareness Day, we’re excited to roll out new updates across Android and Chrome, plus new resources for the ecosystem.

title: How we’re using AI to combat the latest scams
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Chrome_TS_KeywordBlog_Header_01.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Chrome and Android are releasing new AI-powered features to help combat online scams.

title: Use Lens to search your screen while you browse on iOS
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Lens_blog_header_j9e4UZY.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Use Google Lens to search your screen within the Google app or Chrome on iOS. Plus, AI Overviews are coming to more Lens queries.

title: 5 ways Chrome Enterprise can secure your business every day
partialText: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Resized_Chrome_Hero_Thumbnail.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Learn how Chrome Enterprise offers an extra layer of protection and control businesses can adapt to meet their needs.
